Articles.Content: So I am modeling an IVA for my DragonV2 capsule but I am not sure on how to model the stuff inside it like a panel that you put props on. Is there a model reference on how big a single kerbal is?

THere's nothing official but there's [this](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/75881?p=1136594&viewfull=1#post1136594). The only other thing I can suggest is to import a stock seat for reference.
